<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_mab_api.A_ConfigTypeMap</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>A_ConfigTypeMap</name> <script><![CDATA[var A_ConfigTypeMap = Class.create(); A_ConfigTypeMap.prototype = { initialize: function() { this.typeMap = { // screens sys_sg_applet_launcher: 'Launcher screen', sys_sg_list_screen: 'List screen', sys_sg_form_screen: 'Record screen', sys_sg_browser_screen: 'Mobile web screen', sys_sg_parameter_screen: 'Input form screen', sys_sg_map_screen: 'Map screen', sys_sg_calendar_screen: 'Calendar screen', sys_sg_chart_screen: 'Chart screen', // Icons and Cards sys_sg_view_config: 'Card', sys_sg_view_template: 'Card template', sys_sg_item_view: 'Legacy card', sys_sg_icon: 'Icon', // Data Items and Relationship Data Items sys_sg_data_item: 'Data item', sys_sg_relationship_data_item: 'Relationship data item' }; this.hideFromContentTreeNodes = [ 'sys_sg_input_type' ]; },
type: 'A_ConfigTypeMap' }; ]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-19 19:55:57</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0c312c58b7c341108223e126de11a98b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>A_ConfigTypeMap</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Mobile App Builder API" source="sn_mab_api">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Mobile App Builder API">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0c312c58b7c341108223e126de11a98b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-19 19:56:18</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
